metadata.title: USN-3751-1 -- Spice vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Spice incorrectly handled certain messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3751-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libspice-server1 - 0.14.0-1ubuntu2.2 libspice-server-dev - 0.14.0-1ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
